item.title: VIM for fun and profit
item.description: Not to start a editor war or anything, but VIM is and always will be the best editor (emacs are vscode are okey). I used different setups (.vimrc and plugins) over the years but for the last couple of years i found cool a setup that i like. Here is breakdown of some useful plugins and VIM built-in features that i use every day. windows vs buffers vs tabs Link to heading Probably everyone using vim used these feature in a way or another.
